forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and a few afternoon clouds. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny to partly cloudy. High near 65F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 16C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 61F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain giving way to foggy conditions overnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High near 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few showers later at night. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers later at night. Low 51F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 58F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 54F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 61F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 16C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 61F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 47F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.
